channel.title: Player Does Not Have Item
channel.description: [font=Century Gothic][color=blue]How would I make it that if a player has a specific item anywhere in their inventory (meaning bank, inventory, anywhere) then you can't recieve the item from an NPC, but if you happen to lose it. You can talk to the NPC to get it back...?

item.title: Player Does Not Have Item
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Well, you can check their inventory and bank for the item to see if they have it.

public boolean hasItem(int id)
{
    for(int i : playerItems)
        if(i == id)
            return true;

    for(int i : bankItems)
        if(i == id)
            return true;

    return false;
}

And then when talking to the npc…

if(hasItem(####))
{
    npcTalk("It appears you still have the item I've given you."); // This method is just being used for demonstration purposes - don't actually try using it.
}
else
{
    npcTalk("Well, luckily for you I have another one. Here.");
    addItem(####, 1);
}
